EmailTemplate.subject: Ignite 2015: Spark Your Future
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
Firstly a HUGE congratulations on completing the NCS Autumn programme!
Due to your hard work and perseverance in completing the programme you are now a fully fledged member of The Challenge Society!
As a member of The Challenge Society you are cordially invited to our first graduate event of this year, bringing together all new 2015 graduates in Brent, Camden, Hackney, Islington and Tower Hamlets.
What is it called? Ignite
What is it about? Ignite is a fun, interactive event for you to focus on your future through employment, volunteering, social action workshops and for you to gain valuable skills to better your career options and well-being.
The details are as follows: 09:45 - 17:00 Saturday 28th November 2015 London Metropolitan University- Holloway
Want a ticket? Click on this THIS LINK and enter the following password: NCSAutumn2015
Tickets are very limited and is on a first come first serve basis. Ticket access closes on Wednesday 25th November at 4pm.
Get the tools you need to spark your future! What are you waiting for?
The Challenge Society
